name: loki
desc: Loki is a command-line interface (CLI) tool designed for managing Dart and Flutter projects featuring multiple packages.

name: LokiBase
desc:
A base class for the Loki CLI tool, which manages Dart & Flutter projects
with multiple packages. Loki is designed to address issues related to stdin
when running Flutter apps with Melos.

name: firstTime
desc: If it is being run for first time or not

name: run
desc: Runs the Loki CLI tool with the provided arguments.
